events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit me and I no longer need it.
The customer's request has been categorized under Refund due to their expressed desire to return the jacket for money back.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah M. to handle the refund request and communicate with the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to return the jacket for a refund. I'm here to assist you with the process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 45789XZ. The jacket is completely new, tags still attached and it’s in the original packaging.
Great, thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund upon receiving the returned jacket. I will email you the prepaid return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I appreciate the prepaid label, this makes it very easy for me.
The refund has been processed successfully after confirming the return of the jacket. You should see the money back in your account soon.
Just following up to ensure your refund was received and that you’re satisfied with the resolution. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since no further questions have been received, we are closing your refund case. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
